price: Mereka mendustakan mukjizat-mukjizat Kami kesemuanya1439, lalu Kami azab mereka sebagai azab dari Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Kuasa
arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
footnotes: 1439.  Maksudnya sembilan buah mukjizat yang diberikan Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā kepada Nabi Musa ‘Alaihissalām lihat catatan kaki nomor 927.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhabū biāyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha ʿazīzin muq'tadirin
